title: Implement Performance Optimization and Caching
description: Add LRU caching, lazy loading, and memory management for improved performance
details: Create internal/cache/ package with LRU cache implementation using golang-lru v2. Implement lazy loading for large epic datasets with pagination. Add memory profiling using pprof for monitoring. Implement background goroutines for non-blocking file operations. Add memory limits and garbage collection optimization. Cache TaskMaster responses and epic data.
testStrategy: Memory usage benchmarking, performance testing under load, cache hit ratio validation, memory leak testing, goroutine leak detection
